function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unequal death rates for different racial and ethnic groups due to COVID-19 disparities","Impact":"Higher mortality rates for Black, Hispanic, Latinx, and indigenous people","Mitigation":"Addressing health disparities, improving access to healthcare, and implementing social support programs","Technologies":"Healthcare technology, data analysis, and public health strategies","People":"Black, Hispanic, Latinx, and indigenous communities","Owner":"Healthcare providers, public health agencies, and policymakers"},{"Description":"Inability to social distance in low-wage jobs and crowded living conditions","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and severe harm","Mitigation":"Providing support for social distancing, improving living conditions, and addressing economic disparities","Technologies":"Remote work technology, housing support programs, and economic assistance programs","People":"Low-wage workers and individuals in crowded living conditions","Owner":"Employers, housing authorities, and policymakers"},{"Description":"Repetitive exposure to racism leading to health deterioration and chronic conditions","Impact":"Higher vulnerability to severe COVID-19 outcomes","Mitigation":"Addressing systemic racism, providing mental health support, and promoting anti-racism education","Technologies":"Telehealth services, mental health apps, and anti-racism training programs","People":"People of color","Owner":"Community organizations, mental health professionals, and educators"}]}
